company.title: Hybrid work rules

company.warning: Warning: these rules will overwrite the ones in place within each team.
company.snackbar_warning: The suggested values are incompatible with a proper calendar declaration.
company.restrictive_info: If activated, your collaborators must necessarily book a desk while declaring working from the office.

offices.title: Work rooms occupancy rate
offices.subtitle: Configure the occupancy rate of each work room and help employees enjoy a safer and more structured working environment.

users.delete_user: Are you sure you want to delete this user ? This update will be reported in the next invoice.
users.enter_email: Please enter the email of the coworker you want to invit into Ceercle. The coworker will receive an email with a link to create an account. Whenever the user will register, it will be automatically reported in the next invoice.

integration.title: Integration with external apps.
integration.subtitle: Onboard your collaborators in one click using one of your current HR app.
